aws::graph::propositions: # Amazon Financial Activities and Investments
Amazon entered into an agreement in Q4 2024 to invest $1.3 billion in a third convertible note.
Amazon will invest an additional $2.7 billion by Q4 2025.
Cash used in financing activities was $15.9 billion in 2023.
Cash used in financing activities was $11.8 billion in 2024.
Cash inflows from financing activities resulted from proceeds from short-term debt in 2023.
Cash inflows from financing activities resulted from proceeds from other and long-term debt in 2023.
Cash inflows from financing activities totaled $18.1 billion in 2023.
Cash inflows from financing activities resulted from proceeds from short-term debt in 2024.
Cash inflows from financing activities resulted from proceeds from other and long-term debt in 2024.
Cash inflows from financing activities totaled $5.1 billion in 2024.
Cash outflows from financing activities resulted from payments of short-term debt in 2023.
Cash outflows from financing activities resulted from payments of other debt in 2023.
Cash outflows from financing activities resulted from payments of long-term debt in 2023.
Cash outflows from financing activities resulted from payments of finance leases in 2023.
Cash outflows from financing activities resulted from payments of financing obligations in 2023.
Cash outflows from financing activities totaled $34.0 billion in 2023.
Cash outflows from financing activities resulted from payments of short-term debt in 2024.
Cash outflows from financing activities resulted from payments of other debt in 2024.
Cash outflows from financing activities resulted from payments of long-term debt in 2024.
Cash outflows from financing activities resulted from payments of finance leases in 2024.
Cash outflows from financing activities resulted from payments of financing obligations in 2024.
Cash outflows from financing activities totaled $17.0 billion in 2024.
Property and equipment acquired under finance leases was $642 million in 2023.
Property and equipment acquired under finance leases was $854 million in 2024.

metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part II/Item 7 - Managementâ€™s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations/
/FORM 10-K/Part II/Item 7 - Managementâ€™s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations/

text:
In Q4 2024, we entered into an agreement and invested $1.3 billion in a third convertible note, and will invest an additional $2.7 billion by Q4 2025.

Cash provided by (used in) financing activities was $(15.9) billion and $(11.8) billion in 2023 and 2024. Cash inflows from financing activities resulted from proceeds from short-term debt, and other and long-term-debt of $18.1 billion and $5.1 billion in 2023 and 2024. Cash outflows from financing activities resulted from payments of short-term debt, and other, long-term debt, finance leases, and financing obligations of $34.0 billion and $17.0 billion in 2023 and 2024. Property and equipment acquired under finance leases was $642 million and $854 million in 2023 and 2024.
